am_dmpu_data_gen.cfg -- Config file used as input to am_dmpu_prov_data_gen_util.py script to generate dmpu_data_blob.
	eg: python3 am_dmpu_prov_data_gen_util.py ./am_config/am_dmpu_data_gen.cfg

am_dmpu_data_gen_nonsec.cfg -- Example config file to generate a non secure dmpu data blob with kce, kpe and oem data encrypted. 

am_dmpu_data_gen_sec.cfg -- Example config file to generate a secure dmpu data blob with kce, kpe and oem data encrypted.

am_dmpu_data_gen_plain_nonsec.cfg -- Example config file to generate a nonsecure data blob with plain( not encrypted) kce, kpe and oem data.
